attributes.action: Lower the annual fee to the GDC for dental professionals
attributes.additional_details: Every year dental professionals are forced to pay high registration fees to the GDC in order to be able to work As a new rule this year they are also making it manditory to have indemnity insurance which is bumping our annual fee up again. We are also given no options for working mothers that work part time or earn less, nurses that are on maternity leave there are no options to pay these fees monthly so therefore forced to pay the whole year.
attributes.background:
Lower the annual registration for dental professionals

Every year dental professionals are forced to pay high registration fees to the GDC in order to be able to work.

rejection.details: The General Dental Council (GDC) is an independent statutory body.
